amendment.description: To improve the allocation of grants through the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 1215 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 1142.
Amendment SA 1215 was modified to reflect a first degree status.
Amendment SA 1215 proposed by Senator Feinstein.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1215 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 65. Record Vote Number: 176.
